An amazing turn-key solution for the small business owner

With the recent addition of their POS, Shopify is a viable solution for bricks and mortar retail stores too.

How can Confetti Design’s Shopify experts help you?

Shopify is a great platform for new and established businesses alike

With the flexibility, security, efficiencies, support and return on investment it offers, Shopify ticks all the boxes to allow online store owners to get on with the business of running their business!

However, you need more than products on a site to make a successful business.

This is where Confetti Design can help!

Whether you are taking the first step into the eCommerce world, or you have an existing site that isn’t making the sales you want, our Melbourne Shopify designers and developers will help your eCommerce site hum!

As a small business owner, you can easily maintain your website yourself, but having a great Shopify developer to support you will help when things get hard.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1611700494694{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-right: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 120px !important;padding-left: 60px !important;}” el_class=”max1100 tabTablet normPadColMobile remTopPad” offset=”vc_hidden-xs”]

  • Design
  • Migration to Shopify
  • Development improvements
  • User experience improvements
  • Ecommerce conversion
  • Ecommerce SEO
[vc_column_text]

Our skilled Shopify designers can custom design your online store or tweak any theme to meet your business and product.

We will always guide you in choosing the right shopify theme. Not all themes are built with the best practice code and you could find your site is slow simply because you chose the wrong theme.[/vc_column_text]

[vc_column_text]

If you’re tired of other platforms holding you back, we can help migrate your online store to Shopify with minimum fuss.

This can include customer history as well as product listings and inventory levels. An experienced Shopify team on your side is critical to effective migration free from errors, lost data, or technical faults.[/vc_column_text]

[vc_column_text]

Looking to upgrade the functionality of your online store? Our shopify expert developers can integrate new functions via 3rd party apps or even a line of code.

We have the skills and knowledge to develop a completely secure and reliable store. Where many agencies fall down is not getting the full picture of your goals and you can spend money of irrelevant development updates.[/vc_column_text]

[vc_column_text]

Improving user experience can improve your customer conversion by 5% percent.

This can have a huge impact on your sales. With decades of experience in online stores we understand what the customer journey should be to ensure you maximise every visitor.[/vc_column_text]

[vc_column_text]

At Confetti we have perfected our conversion checklist that help fill the leaking sales holes in your shopify ecommerce site.[/vc_column_text]

[vc_column_text]

A vital part of your marketing strategy should include optimising your products and Search Engine Optimisation.

Without traffic being driven to your site you will be under utilising your sales potential. SEO helps in the visibility of your site and our Shopify SEO experts will identify opportunities for your business growth and boosting your income.[/vc_column_text]

What is Shopify?

Shopify is an ecommerce solution that allows you to set up store to sell your goods both online and off without hassle. With the recent addition of their POS it’s a viable solution for bricks and mortar retail stores too. Australian store owners have been quick to adopt Shopify as their ecommerce platform of choice. Although it is a turn-key solution you can benefit from our Shopify developer and Shopify designers to ensure your site looks great, functions well and attracts your target market.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1563878715375{padding-right: 5% !important;padding-left: 5% !important;}”]

Why choose Shopify?

We offer both WordPress Online stores and Shopify. They are both fabulous platforms but one may be more suited to you than the other.

Here are some important features of Shopify that may help you. We will always run through the pros and cons with you before you choose one too.

Shopify is very flexible, easy to get started with, you can easily maintain it yourself as a small business owner, although having a great Shopify developer to support you will help when things get hard. Shopify online stores have an ability to grow with you as your business grows.

Some of the inbuilt features are:

  • It provides business owners with a solid yet flexible store builder that can increase conversions and sales
  • Easy to update, you generally do not need to be a Shopify developer to maintain the site once it is set up and live
  • Can reduce a lot of administrative tasks due to it’s platform structure
  • Provides valuable management information
  • It has easy to manage search engine optimisation functionality
  • Easily integrated with other sales channels such as Instagram & Facebook

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1541467602395{padding-right: 5% !important;padding-left: 5% !important;}”]

With the flexibility, security, efficiencies, support and return on investment it offers, Shopify ticks all the boxes to allow online store owners to get on with the business of running their business. And if you get stuck you can rely on our expert Shopify developer to help you.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_separator color=”custom” el_width=”10″ accent_color=”#ca0043″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]
